title: Pet Friendly Community! We welcome your furry friends!

'− Patio or Balcony Options', '− Roommate Floor Plans', '− Townhomes Available', '− Upgraded Lighting Package', 'About Our Community:', 'Get ready for a refreshing new take on apartment living, at East Perimeter Pointe.', 'These newly renovated apartments in Decatur, GA offer the pinnacle of comfort, convenience, and style, with spacious and streamlined 1- and 2-bedroom floor plans, top-notch amenities and a wonderful location just 20 minutes east of downtown Atlanta along I-20.', 'Each of our dynamic and inviting apartment homes is smartly appointed with upgraded lighting packages, sunrooms, and custom paint tones, all of which work together to create a homey and inspiring environment.', 'Our amenities list is the envy of Decatur, featuring both indoor and outdoor pools, lighted tennis courts, and a cardio and fitness center, among many other enticing attractions.', 'Wonderful Amenities:', '− Accepts Electronic Payments', '− BBQ Area', '− Business Center', '− Community/Onsite Parking', '− Fitness Center', '− Green Community', '− Laundry Facilities', '− Online Leasing', '− On-Site Maintenance', '− Onsite Management', '− Electronic Rent Payment', '− Gazebo & Grilling Areas', '− Monthly Resident Events', '− On-site Maintenance Management', '− Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '− Public Transportation', '− Racquetball Court(s)', '− Resident Referral Bonuses', '− Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', 'Contact Information:', 'Address:', '4946 Snapfinger Woods Dr.', 'Decatur, GA 30035', 'show contact info', 'Facebook:', '<URL>', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '2640529D7B6F4567']
